segments.text: What have you been up to , Johnny ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know-sweeping , scrubbing , washing , drying , waxing , polishing ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , your grandma's really having a field day with you , huh ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You got that right ... and my mom's still mad about what we did with the dishes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have all the fun , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Listen , I'd better get back to the grindstone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure thing , Johnny . Watch out for dishpan hands there , kid !
segments.speaker: S1
